creator: Robert_Flaherty@Hyperion.com
text:
Currently using "EEE, d MMM yyyy kk:mm:ss z" and should be using "EEE, dd MMM 
yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz", fixed length (currently variable), hours 0-23 (currently 1-
24).

creator: luetzkendorf@apache.org
text: Done. I generalized handling of properties with date values.
